title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can reserve an experience by opening the CultPass app, selecting your desired event, and tapping 'Reserve'. Be sure to arrive 15 minutes early with your QR code ready."

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription includes 4 curated experiences each month. You can choose from museums, concerts, film events and more. Premium events may have an extra cost, which is shown during reservation."

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'வுகளை:

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel or pause your subscription at any time via the 'My Account' section in the CultPass app. Cancelation takes effect at the end of your billing cycle."

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes
- For persistent login issues, escalate to human support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try tapping 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Make sure you're using the email associated with your account. If the email doesn't arrive, check spam or try again in a few minutes."

title: Payment and Billing Inquiries
content:
Handle payment-related issues professionally:

- For failed payments: Check if payment method is valid and has sufficient funds
- For refund requests: Explain that refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after approval
- For billing disputes: Escalate to billing team with ticket details
- For payment method changes: Guide users to 'My Account' > 'Payment Settings'

**Suggested phrasing:**
"I can help you with your billing concern. Let me check your account details and assist you with updating your payment information."

title: App Technical Issues and Troubleshooting
content:
Common app troubleshooting steps:

- For crashes: Ask user to force close app and restart
- For slow loading: Check internet connection and app version
- For missing events: Refresh the events feed or clear app cache
- For QR code issues: Ensure screen brightness is high and code is not obscured
- If issues persist after basic troubleshooting, escalate to technical team

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Let's try some quick troubleshooting steps. First, please close the app completely and reopen it. Also, make sure you have a stable internet connection."

title: Experience Availability and Waitlists
content:
Managing experience capacity and waitlists:

- Popular experiences may reach capacity quickly
- Users can join waitlists for sold-out events
- Waitlist notifications are sent 24-48 hours before events
- Alternative similar experiences should be suggested
- Premium experiences may have different availability rules

**Suggested phrasing:**
"This experience is currently full, but I can add you to the waitlist. You'll be notified if spots become available. I can also suggest similar experiences that are currently open for reservation."

title: Account Settings and Profile Management
content:
Help users manage their account settings:

- Profile updates: Name, email, phone number in 'My Account'
- Notification preferences: Push, email, SMS settings
- Privacy settings: Data sharing and marketing preferences
- Account deletion: Requires verification and has 30-day grace period
- Data export: Available upon request through support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can update your profile information in the 'My Account' section. For privacy settings or account deletion, I can guide you through the process or escalate to our privacy team."

title: Family and Group Subscriptions
content:
Managing family and group accounts:

- Family plans support up to 4 members with shared billing
- Each member gets individual experience allocation
- Group organizers can manage member permissions
- Billing is handled by the primary account holder
- Members can be added/removed through 'Family Settings'

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Family plans allow up to 4 members to share a subscription. Each member gets their own experience allowance and can make individual reservations."

title: Experience Reviews and Feedback
content:
Handling experience feedback:

- Encourage users to rate experiences after attendance
- Address negative feedback professionally and offer solutions
- For venue-related issues: Forward feedback to partner venues
- For exceptional experiences: Thank users and encourage sharing
- Collect detailed feedback for service improvement

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Thank you for sharing your experience feedback. We take all reviews seriously and will share your comments with the relevant team to improve future experiences."

title: Gift Cards and Promotional Codes
content:
Managing gift cards and promotions:

- Gift cards can be purchased for 1, 3, 6, or 12-month subscriptions
- Promotional codes are applied during checkout or in 'Redeem Code'
- Expired codes cannot be extended without manager approval
- Gift card recipients create new accounts or apply to existing ones
- Track usage and expiration dates for customer inquiries

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Gift cards are a great way to share CultPass! You can purchase them in various durations, and recipients can easily redeem them when creating their account."

title: Accessibility and Special Accommodations
content:
Supporting users with accessibility needs:

- Many partner venues offer wheelchair accessibility
- Audio descriptions and sign language services vary by venue
- Users can filter experiences by accessibility features
- Special accommodations should be requested 48 hours in advance
- Partner with venues to ensure inclusive experiences

**Suggested phrasing:**
"We're committed to inclusive experiences. You can filter events by accessibility features in the app, and we'll work with venues to accommodate special needs when possible."
tags: accessibility, accommodations, inclusive, venues, special needs

title: Corporate and Business Accounts
content:
Managing corporate subscriptions:

- Corporate accounts support bulk user management
- Billing is handled through corporate invoicing
- Admin users can manage team member access
- Usage reports available for HR and management teams
- Corporate rates available for 20+ users

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Corporate subscriptions offer great team-building opportunities. Admin users can manage team access and track engagement through our reporting dashboard."

title: Data Privacy and Security
content:
Addressing privacy and security concerns:

- User data is encrypted and stored securely
- Location data is only used for experience recommendations
- Users can opt-out of data sharing at any time
- GDPR and CCPA compliance maintained
- Security incidents should be escalated immediately

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your privacy and security are our top priorities. We use industry-standard encryption and give you full control over your data sharing preferences."

title: How to update my profile?
content: You can update your profile information by going to the "My Account" section in the app.

title: How to change my password?
content: You can change your password by going to the "My Account" section and clicking on "Change Password".

title: How to contact customer support?
content: You can contact customer support through the "Help" section in the app, or by emailing support@cultpass.com.

title: What is the refund policy?
content: We offer a full refund within 14 days of purchase. After 14 days, no refunds are issued.

title: How to use a promo code?
content: You can apply a promo code at checkout to receive a discount on your subscription.

title: Are there any family plans?
content: Yes, we offer family plans that allow you to add up to 4 family members to your account.

title: How to download my data?
content: You can request a download of your data from the "Privacy" section in your account settings.

title: How to delete my account?
content: You can delete your account from the "My Account" section. Please note that this action is irreversible.

title: How to provide feedback?
content: We welcome your feedback! You can provide feedback through the "Feedback" section in the app.

title: How to refer a friend?
content: You can refer a friend through the "Refer a Friend" section in the app and earn rewards.
